Chapter 2 The History of EarthTime Mapmaking and the use of maps is an ancient idea, its an impulse weve had for thousands of years. As humans weve been drawing our whereabouts on cave walls since the dawn of our species, but weve come a long way in the last couple hundred years. Theres an amazing diversity of the kinds of maps that were seeing today.
